name: Somnium (itch) (ThatsItSirYoureLeaving)
description:
General Information:

A short, gravity-based puzzle-platformer inspired by one of those pesky fever dreams I had a while back, wherein I was driving along the highway when things started to get weird (as they tend to do).

Only available as a download since this is another entry into my running series of "games that I was planning on realising as WebGL applications, but I realised a day before deadline that something wasn't working, and I didn't have the energy to fix it".

Also, the game does not contain any clear references to the Game Jam's theme "heal". I had an idea for a game that coincided with the jam's start, and my participation was mostly for motivational purposes. I have no shame. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Lastly, I made the music myself and have included the two tracks that were used as separate downloads. In case anyone is interested.

How to Play:

Move: WASD
Look around: MOUSE
Jump: SPACE
Boost while Airborne: SHIFT (Unlockable)
